quest.name: Operation Archon
journal: Minfilia would brief you on the Eorzean Alliance's planned counteroffensive against the Empire.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Minfilia at the Waking Sands.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

The Immortal Flames stand ready to launch their assault on the imperial outpost at Cape Westwind. Make your way to the staging point situated before the enemy stronghold, and report for duty to Lieutenant Adalbert.
Phase one of Operation Archon is now in motion. Enter the imperial outpost and fight your way through to the innermost sector.

The path leading to the innermost sector of the imperial outpost is now open, and a confrontation with Rhitahtyn sas Arvina awaits. Proceed when you are ready and strike down the praefectus.

※Cape Westwind can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
At the end of a fierce struggle, you deal Rhitahtyn his death-blow, consigning the first Roegadyn to hold the rank of praefectus to history. Phase one of Operation Archon has ended in success.

With Rhitahtyn's demise, the forces garrisoned at Castrum Occidens have been thrown into disarray. For now, withdraw to the Immortal Flames encampment north of Vesper Bay, and report to the Allied communications officer.
The time has come to commence the second phase of Operation Archon. When you are ready, request further orders from the Allied communications officer.
objectives: * This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Minfilia at the Waking Sands.
(Reach the innermost gate. Unlocks access to the imperial outpost)

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “My Little Chocobo (MaelstromTwin AdderImmortal Flames).”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may accept the quest “My Little Chocobo (MaelstromTwin AdderImmortal Flames)” by speaking with R'ashaht Rhiki at Maelstrom CommandVorsaile Heuloix at the Adders' NestCommander Swift at the Hall of Flames.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: All present? Then let us begin.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We have received the details of the impending operation.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In what promises to be the largest single counteroffensive in the realm's troubled history, the Alliance will strike at every imperial stronghold standing upon Eorzean soil.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As might be expected, the operation will be complex, but you need not commit its intricacies to memory.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It is enough that each man understands his part and plays it to the best of his ability.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The finer instructions, you will receive at each staging point.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: To begin, let us review the distribution of our forces.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: From west to east─the Maelstrom of Limsa Lominsa, the Immortal Flames of Ul'dah, and the Order of the Twin Adder of Gridania.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Next, let us examine the locations of the imperial strongholds.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Near Limsa Lominsa, we have Castrum Occidens, situated in eastern Vylbrand, and Castrum Marinum, which lies to the south and east, in the midst of the Rhotano Sea.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Near Ul'dah, we have Castrum Meridianum to the north, and the coastal outpost at Cape Westwind which connects Castrum Marinum to the mainland by means of a magitek transporter.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Near Gridania, we have Castrum Oriens, which lies upon the eastern edge of the Twelveswood.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: And finally, in Mor Dhona...stands Castrum Centri. A thorn in the heart of Eorzea.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The forthcoming operation will see Allied forces assault each of the aforementioned locations, with the ultimate objective of destroying the Empire's new weapon, housed within Castrum Meridianum.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As one might expect of the Black Wolf's seat of power, Castrum Meridianum boasts all but impenetrable defenses. If we are to breach it, we must needs isolate it from its sister strongholds.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: To do otherwise would be to risk being caught 'twixt hammer and anvil.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The operation will comprise four distinct phases, all told.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The first shall see us eliminate one of the Black Wolf's most trusted lieutenants─Rhitahtyn sas Arvina.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: According to our intelligence, the praefectus is due to visit the imperial outpost at Cape Westwind for an inspection.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: When he arrives, we shall dispatch an elite adventurer unit to eliminate him. Forename, we would have you lead this assault.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Rhitahtyn is a peerless field tactician. Shorn of his leadership, the garrison at Castrum Occidens will be as a snake without its head.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Phase two will see us sever Castrum Meridianum's primary lines of supply.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As soon as Rhitahtyn's presence is confirmed at the coastal outpost, the Maelstrom will lay siege to Castrum Occidens.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: At that very hour, the Lominsan Armada, helmed by the Admiral herself, shall move to blockade Castrum Marinum.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, in the Twelveswood, the Order of the Twin Adder will surround Castrum Oriens.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: And they'll have the sylphs to help them! Frixio's been waiting for a chance to avenge these ones!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Phase three shall see us neutralize Castrum Meridianum's defenses.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forming our main thrust, the Immortal Flames will march against the stronghold with all their strength. While the enemy's eyes are thus drawn outwards, another elite adventurer unit shall infiltrate the castrum.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Its mission: to disable the magitek field generator which protects the Praetorium, a fortress within a fortress wherein the Ultima Weapon is believed to be housed. Forename, we would have you take command once more.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, the Order of the Twin Adder will blockade the railway which connects Centri and Meridianum, preventing the timely arrival of reinforcements from Mor Dhona.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: A wise precaution. The monstrous locomotive which runs back and forth between the two castra is capacious enough to transport a small army, by all accounts.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: It is well the Garleans did not think to give it wings.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Once Meridianum's defenses have been compromised, the operation will enter its fourth and final phase.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This will see the Immortal Flames enter the stronghold and suppress the remnants of the enemy garrison.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Allowing Forename's unit to pass unopposed into the Praetorium, where they will locate and destroy the Ultima Weapon.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: By this feat shall the operation be deemed a success.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In addition to the Grand Companies, we can count upon the support of a variety of other parties, from the pirates of Limsa Lominsa to the Monetarists of Ul'dah. In all, the operation will involve no fewer than twelve major factions.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text:
Legend holds that the Archons were twelve in one, and one in twelve...
It is for this reason that our grand endeavor has been dubbed “Operation Archon.”

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Countless free companies have also pledged their swords, and more join us by the day. At long last, all of Eorzea is rising as one.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As before, we Scions shall work in concert with the Grand Companies. Yda, Papalymo, Y'shtola─pray accompany your respective organizations on their missions.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Urianger, I would have you represent us in Ul'dah. Reassure the financiers that they have made a sound investment. When that is done, pray return here and aid in the coordination of our forces.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Tataru, please assist Urianger in any way you are able, and ensure that everyone is kept abreast of the latest developments.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Minfilia, Cid, and I shall accompany the main host in an advisory capacity. It will be our task to analyze intelligence as it comes into our possession, and make the necessary recommendations to command.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: As Alphinaud mentioned, you are to lead the elite unit of adventurers whose task it will be to see each of Operation Archon's main objectives fulfilled. Yours is the most important role of all, and like to be the most dangerous. Pray choose your party well, and stint not in your preparation.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The battle for the future of the realm is about to begin. Together, let us show the Black Wolf the power of a united Eorzea!

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Pray report to the Immortal Flames encampment situated to the north of here when you are ready to be briefed on your first mission.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I cannot stress this enough, but please be careful. May you walk in the light of the Crystal.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: You are well come, Forename Surname of the Scions. As communications officer, it falls to me to issue you your orders, and provide guidance on forthcoming missions.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: Your first mission is to infiltrate the imperial outpost at Cape Westwind and eliminate Praefectus Rhitahtyn sas Arvina.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: All participating units are now in position and awaiting your arrival. Please proceed to the staging point and report to Lieutenant Adalbert.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: This is but the first step in our bid to purge the realm of the Garlean menace. I shall pray for your success!

dialogue.name: ADALBELT
dialogue.text: No text

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: So you're Forename Surname, the fearless leader of the elite adventurer unit. We've been expecting you.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: Our Maelstrom friends report that Rhitahtyn sas Arvina departed Castrum Occidens a bell ago.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: And sure enough, a convoy of imperial airships landed here just now.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: The likelihood is high that our target was aboard one of the vessels. I've dispatched scouts to verify his presence before we strike.

dialogue.name: FLAMERUNNER
dialogue.text: Command to all units. Requesting status report.

dialogue.name: FIRSTPLATOON
dialogue.text: This is Antlion I. Target has not been sighted.

dialogue.name: SECONDPLATOON
dialogue.text: This is Antlion II. Likewise, target has not been sighted.

dialogue.name: THIRDPLATOON
dialogue.text: Antlion III here. We've got nothin' for ye neither.

dialogue.name: FOURTHPLATOON
dialogue.text: This is Antlion IV. Nothing to report as of─

dialogue.name: FOURTHPLATOON
dialogue.text: Wait! Disregard previous message! Target sighted. I say again: target sighted.

dialogue.name: FLAMERUNNER
dialogue.text: Understood. Hold your position.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: Attention, all units. This is Lieutenant Adalbert Cotter.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: The first step of Operation Archon begins with us. Should we falter here, all hope of victory will be lost.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: 'Tis no small burden, but know that I believe in all of you. So believe in yourselves, and together we will blaze a path for our brothers and sisters of the Alliance to follow.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: We will create multiple diversions and disperse the enemy garrison. That should give you a chance to breach their defenses.

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: Go now, Forename, and bring us Rhitahtyn's head! May Rhalgr grant you strength!

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: Commence diversionary maneuvers!

dialogue.name: ADALBERT
dialogue.text: Go now, Forename, and bring us Rhitahtyn's head! May Rhalgr grant you strength!

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: It would appear we have unexpected guests.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Now, where have I seen you before? Ah, but of course─the womanman who felled the mighty Titan.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALCENTURION
dialogue.text: This is the eikon-slayer!?

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: I see. The commotion without is naught but a diversion.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Allow me to hazard a guess: by eliminating me, you hope to undermine the garrison at Occidens.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: A bold strategy, to be sure, but have you the strength to see it to fruition?

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Leave us. None of you are a match for herhim.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Send word to Castrum Occidens. Tell them the Lominsans are coming.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALCENTURION
dialogue.text: At once, my lord!

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Fifteen years have come and gone since Lord van Baelsar first set foot in Eorzea, yet his ambition for the realm burns as strong as ever it did. Know you what fuels it, adventurer? The desire to deliver the people from their suffering.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: The lands he has conquered were all beset with problems─poverty, starvation, lawlessness, and strife. My homeland was no exception. Had my lord not reached out and claimed it for the Empire, it would eventually have destroyed itself.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: But under his sage leadership, my people enjoyed such peace and stability as we had never known. And he only desires the selfsame for the people of this realm. Under his rule, Eorzea would be free from the shackles which bind it─the shackles of false faith.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: There would be no feeble leaders to misguide the masses, no eikons to bleed the realm dry. True peace would reign, and the people would be free to live their lives without fear of persecution or oppression.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Should you doubt the truth of my words, I bid you look upon me. I am no son of Garlemald, yet Lord van Baelsar saw fit to raise me to a station of great honor.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: He measures a man not by his birth, but by his worth. Such is his sense of justice. By the grace of His Excellency, I am where I was born to be─upon the field of battle.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: He has given me a noble cause to fight for, and worthy adversaries to smite.

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: I am not wont to bare my steel needlessly. But if you are deaf to reason...

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: In the name of Lord van Baelsar, I, Rhitahtyn sas Arvina, do swear to strike you down!

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: <gasp> <pant>

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Forgive me... I have failed you...

dialogue.name: RHITAHTYN
dialogue.text: Lord van Baelsar!!!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: That light─ <gasp> The magitek transporter!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forename, are you there? What news of Rhitahtyn? ...Fallen?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: With this deed, you have sown the seeds of our ultimate victory.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The fading of that light presages an end to the Empire's tyranny!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Rhitahtyn sas Arvina is no more!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Let the next phase of Operation Archon commence!

dialogue.name: ALLIEDARMIES
dialogue.text: (-All-)HURRAH!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: 'Tis I! It seems you've done it again, Forename!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I'd raise a tankard to you, but I'm afraid we've no time to savor the victory. There's still the small matter of infiltrating Castrum Meridianum and destroying the Ultima Weapon!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I know, I know...no rest for the preternaturally gifted. Now stop feeling sorry for yourself, and make your way back to the Immortal Flames' encampment. The communications officer will issue you your orders. I'll be waiting for you with the main host.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAANCIENT
dialogue.text: Look, Hydaelyn─Your minion comes...bringing the Light.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAANCIENT
dialogue.text: Alas, the gate to the void already stands open. Soon, Darkness shall consume all, and you shall bow down before the one true god.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAANCIENT
dialogue.text: Ahahahahaha!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: The praefectus...slain?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALMILITUM
dialogue.text: Regrettably so, my lord. And at the hand of the eikon-slayer, if the centurion who survived the attack is to be believed.

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: Rhitahtyn...

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Where were his men when he faced the enemy!? Fleeing, even as their commander yielded up his last breath!? If it should prove they questioned his right...

dialogue.name: IMPERIALMILITUM
dialogue.text: I-I cannot speak for them, my lord.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSTAFF
dialogue.text: ...Beg pardons, my lord, but there is more. The Maelstrom has laid siege to Castrum Occidens.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSTAFF
dialogue.text: Likewise, the Crimson Fleet moves to blockade Castrum Marinum.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: So this is their answer...

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Very well! We shall crush them as we crushed the eikons!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Go forth and show them the futility of their resistance!

dialogue.name: LIVIANERO
dialogue.text: (-Tribuni-)Yes, my lord!

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: Scion Surname! Your deeds this day are an inspiration to us all!

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: With the death of the praefectus, Operation Archon has entered its second phase. Even as we speak, the Maelstrom moves to blockade Castrum Occidens and Castrum Marinum.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: And far to the east, in the Black Shroud, the Order of the Twin Adder advances upon Castrum Oriens.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: Already, you have done much to advance our cause, performing such feats as are worthy of song─but if our plan is to succeed, more is required of you.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: Let me know when your preparations are in order, and I shall relay to you the particulars of your next mission.

dialogue.name: KANRIKAN
dialogue.text: The assault on Cape Westwind is but the first step in our bid to purge the realm of the Garlean menace. I shall pray for your success!
